name: Corrupt In Spring (Enhanced)
description:
This is the enhanced version of "Corrupt In Spring" game with better lighting and effects. If it is too intense for your PC then play the normal non-enhanced version of "Corrupt In Spring".

"Corrupt In Spring" is a game where you protect 5 different trees in a level grow to an adult. once they are an adult move on to the next charging tree. each charging tree complete will add to the progress of the spirit trees growth at the centre.  Once all 5 trees are grow a gold circle will appear on the ground allow the player to move on to the next level.

Waves on corrupt spirits will attempt to attack the charging trees and will result in damaging the spirit tree. A score for each level will be available in the main menu so that you can try and beat your last score.

Enjoy and thanks for trying it out.
